data.actual_result: The circle is grey, though i still appear online in every other way.
data.expected_result: The circle attached to my profile picture is yellow, since I'm idle
data.short_description: Discord shows me as online but the status circle is grey (better steps to reproduce now)
data.steps_to_repro: - Login to discord, make sure the last guild you had open was a lazy guild - Quickly swap to invisible (before every thing loads in) and then back to any other status, in my case I used idle - Check your status in that and other servers
